page.shortlink: ux properties date picker month names
page.description: Specify the month names to be shown when the pop-up data picker is used. Enter a comma separated list. TIP: You can also set the month names in this special session variable: session._protected_datePickerMonthNames.

section.description: The 'Date picker - month names' property can be tagged with [text dictionary tags]. Each month can then be written in multiple languages and displayed in the calendar whenever a given language is active. When using this approach, each month will need to be tagged...
